document.full_text: a soyuz craft adorned with a portrait of the first man in space docked with the international space station thursday, days before the 50th anniversary of yuri gagarin's pioneering flight.
document.title: soyuz docks 50 years after gagarin's voyage
lines_and_colors: a soyuz craft adorned with a portrait of the first man in space docked with the international space station thursday, days before the 50th anniversary of yuri gagarin's pioneering flight.
